data.title: The Sparrow by Mary Doria Russell, Signed
data.meta_description: Children of God: A Novel (The Sparrow Series) by Russell, Mary Doria and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Soft cover. Condition: Very Good. Giottto di Bodone, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Edition. This book in pictorial wraps is an Uncorrected Proof of the Hardcover First Edition. The book has light wear to the covers and light tanning and light wear to the page block. 2 4 6 8 9 7 5 3 First Edition number line. Signed by the author on the title page. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First Edition, First Printing. First edition, first printing hardcover signed by the author, with all first issue points present. Unclipped plastic covered dust jacket, page block face is rough cut, and remainder mark to page block head. Page block is lightly blemished, and spine ends slightly bumped. Otherwise, as unread. LW. Signed by Author. Used.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. 1st Edition. The edge's of the page block are slightly dusty and there is a small remainder dot to the bottom of the page block. The dust jacket has light wear to the extremities, a 1/4" closed tear to the top of the spine, and is unclipped ($23.00). 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 number line. Signed by the author on the title page. This book has the correct First Edition points. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. The book has a small, light stain to the bottom of the page block. The dust has slight soiling to the covers and jacket is unclipped ($23.00). 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 number line. Signed by the author on the title page. This book has the correct First Edition points. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. 1st Edition. Light wear to dust jacket extremities, Blank book plate, Nice inscription by author to title page. First Edition/first printing (as noted below, which see), with all points correct (photographer's name spelled as Ross rather than Rossi on rear flap,"karstic" (pg. 16) and "thirty-two feet per second" (pg. 95) rather than the later corrections, "karst" and " thirty-two feet per second per second". The words "First Edition" with a number line starting with 2 - a Random House/Villard convention - appear on the copyright page. Octavo, illustrated jacket, blue cloth boards 408 numbered pages. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. True first edition with "karstic" on page 16. SIGNED label by author laid in. Hardcover book & DJ in NEW Fine excellent condition. FIRST EDITION FIRST PRINTING. Bright clean ,tight crisp. Faint remainder mark. Not exlibrary, no underlining,no margin notes, not price clipped.Not a book club.Corners not bent. Shelf 1058. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Collectible-Very Good. First Edition. Villard, 1996. Hardcover. Flat signed to title page. First Edition with number line to 2 and First Edition stated. First Edition points present ('karstic' on line 12 of page 16 etc.). Book is clean, tight, and unmarked with mild wear and bumping to corners. Unclipped dust jacket ($23.00) with light edge wear, now protected in transparent, archival mylar sleeve. Near Fine in Near Fine dust jacket. Signed By Author.
